The actual gcode:

M107
M104 S205
M140 S60
M190 S60
M109 S205
G29 ;
G92 E0.0
G1 Z0.2 Y2.0 X60.0 E9.0  F1000.0
G1 X100.0 E12.5  F1000.0
G92 E0.0
G21 ; set units to millimeters
G90 ; use absolute coordinates
M83 ; use relative distances for extrusion
G1 E-1.50000 F2100.00000
G1 Z0.150 F7200.000
M204 S1000
G1 F4000
G1 X50 Y155 
G1 F1080
